hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.SFM Maze Wonderitem 2: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #3# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #an Ice Trap# and #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #0# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Deku Stick#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #the Fire Temple#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that Jabu Jabu is no longer a pescetarian in Master Quest.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: Dear @, please come to the castle. I've baked a cake for you.&Yours truly, princess Zelda.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Saria's Song# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the song written in the #royal tomb# is #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find a pool guarded by a #Tektite#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #an Ice Trap# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #1# major item.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path of #time#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Map of the Bottom of the Well# and #a Deku Tree Compass#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Serenade of Water#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Lullaby Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: Have you found all 41 Gossip Stones?^Only 40 of us give hints.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: You would be surprised at all the things you can Hookshot in the Spirit Temple!

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to the #Spirit Medallion#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: Did you know that Barinade, Volvagia and Twinrova hard require the Boomerang, Megaton Hammer and Mirror Shield, respectively?
